Blitzar

Form & table generator for Vue 3

Get Started

Simple & JSON

Generate entire forms based on a simple JSON schema

Flexible

Supports ALL Vue components & All HTML elements

Powerful

Arrow functions allow for validation/conditional fields/changing props

Components

  • BlitzForm
  • BlitzListForm
  • BlitzTable
